mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Legacy Convention", Americans Return to Dance Roots", "1985-1986 Square Dance Directory", "Keeping Our Heritage Alive", "Take A Good Look: The Teacup Chain", "Refreshment Time", "35th National Square Dance Convention", "Current Releases", and "Square Dance Date Book." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (Letters to the Editor), "As I See It", "The Changing Scene", "Advanced Dancing", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month" and "On the Record."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
